name: Is this task Green Star related?
Have you contacted/informed Built Environs Green Star representative?
All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached/commented
External wall timber framing is treated to min H1.2 treatment levels. Specify if any other treatment to be used.
Dimensions / locations of walls checked and correct
Timber framing set out. i.e. Stud spacing and nog spacing.
Framing straightness. Nogs flush with studs, and studs flush with top and bottom plates.
Fixings and hold down bolts checked and correct
Moisture reading checked, recorded and acceptable
All relevant nog (service and Special/fixture) installed, checked and correct
DHT installed checked and correct seismic gap
All openings are in correct location and correct size
